_header: The Son of the Father of heaven bliss
_description: A Christmas carol—four quatrains (aaab) with refrain, ‘Processit ex virgine’ and burden: ‘Verbum patris hodie / Processit ex virgine’

OxfBal354.First Lines:
The son of the fader of hevyn blysWas born as thys day I will not
                    mys…
OxfBal354.Last Lines:
…For the to sofer & for to dyeProcessit ex
                    virgineExplicit
